Blog.post: Haha! just now, hui ying n sherrie was typing 2 me but then i didn't reply, when i replied, hui ying asked if i went 2 gunbound but i said no. they replied :"Then?". I told them i went 2 look 4 tony sun n sherrie almost puke. i told them tat i'll tell them later n then they asked me 2 spill the beans. Now, i m going 2 tell u where i went, i came here n type this.

My god!!!! Today, i just read through the Teenage Magazine, i found out tat Li Young (from K-one) 's birthday is just one day before my birthday. Then, i found out tat J.R.(from K-one) 's birthday is 3 days after my birthday!! So coincidental! My birthday is on 2nd November, Li Young's birthday is on 1st November n J.R.'s birthday is on 5th November!

This is yen ler aka sun haha. This afternoon, i bought teenage the coverpage has 5566 n K-one on it. i opened the book n saw a 5566 bookmark but i was sad as the bookmark prints Zax's pic not Tony's pic.

i just went 2 the pasar malam(night market), i bought lots of food n now i m full~ This morning go 2 Toa Payoh Stadium, i saw old folks doing Taichi( Tai Ji in chinese). i run very slow leh, i lost 2 Kiu Yan some more, so sad~ Kiu Yan is position 20, i 21 leh~! dunno whether m i the last or not?? I cannot get gold 4 my Napfa this year liao! i only do 2 inclined pull-ups!

Oh no!~ it's like a year passed, i didn't update my blog at all.(eg: no new posts,etc.) I think next time i should put reminders all over my house 2 remind me, but tat will be alot of papers waste, but i dun care so much lah!

today, we celebrated National Day in school. I had a happy time in school, playing wif liya wif Serene's microphone! n then when going home that time the stupid auntie go tell me 2 sit bus 3, then later half way going home that time ask me 2 change bus, go n sit bus 2! Idiot man!

hai..... today got nothing much 2 say. Only yesterday got punishment by Mrs Ngain.I only ask Xin Hui 2 lend me scoth tape cos my science wb the page tear mah, then she say i talking, ask me 2 stand up!

today got music. Ms Chow make me, chloe, steph n serene 2 sing "We will Get there" in front of the class. me n chloe did not get any merit points 4 that but then serene n steph got 1 merit point each. after that nobody wanted 2 sing Singapore town so the whloe class sang together! Sherrie, Serene, Steph, Chloe n I did the dance steps but then only me, sherrie n serene got 3 merit points 4 that! So bad she only give Chloe 2 merit points 4 that~

Wow~ so lucky, i still got A or B(very confused) 4 my 1.6 km run! my timing is 10.55 mins but then i came in 21, Kiu Yan came in 20 leh n then her timing is 10.54 mins, Janie's timing also 10.54 mins leh! Almost the same u noe! *.*

today, i got cca. After cca, i went home n bathe, i reach home @ 3.30pm,eng tuition @ 4.30pm. After eng tuition, i went home reach home @ about 6.45pm then go 4 Chinese tuition @ 8 pm after that i reach home already 9.45pm liao! Don't u think this is a busy day 4 me?

i HATE everyone in this universe except TONY n ALL MY FRIENS n RELATIVES n IDOLS . I HATE JANIE SUAN ~ she is irritating! today she even stepped on my chair n beat me. I asked everyone 2 step on her chair but then she changed her chair~ Now i m treating her like a servant! HAHAHA~ i'll continue 2 torture her as much as i can~ HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!!!!!!
arh...... help my leg has been aching since yesterday! although i did some leg massage on my leg wif the machine but then now still very pain!!!!!!! help me~~~

yesterday after HMT, serene, chloe n me were walking on the pathway leading 2 the overhead bridge then serene almost fell down!!! chloe n i laughed from the start of the overhead bridge 2 the bus-stop non-stop! Hahahaha! then later we saw Julia Nin (korean name: Me Re), wad a funny korean name. then julia came 2 us n started 2 scratch us like a cat, we ran away but she chased after us, then she scratched my hand until it was swollen or so called"red". Luckily, chloe took down evidence by taking a photo of her scratching me wif her hp, next time can go report police, say she assault me!
i m so angry!!! Hui Ying insulted me n tony! She said that tony sucks n she called tony as tonnie! Damn it! Fuck off!

on monday, i went 2 c 5566! tony so handsome! when singing easy come easy go, he jumped from the stage 2 the fence. he wear sunglassess somemore~ n i also saw Zax n Tony waving 2 me n the other fans standing beside me~ i took 30++ pics~ before 5566 arrived, the fans standing around me were all toking 2 e handsome security guard n they were taking photos of him! but he is not as handsome as Tony!

i hate Ms Li!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! 38 mins before, she was scolding us like hell, she said we have a crap attitude, driving her 2 her hell! She say that wad happen is not funny but then i like 2 laugh wad, cannot meh? wah lao, she treated us like P1 girls! At 1pm, she ask us 2 go out of the classroom n then hold our partners hand n put our fingers on our lips.
